author: jukka
msg: JCR-2744: Avoid element arrays in PathImpl
Change Path.getDepth() to return 0 for an identifier, as that's better in line with the way the depth of a relative path is handled.

author: jleroux
msg: Fix a bug introduced by r966202 and merged at r987348.
The bug appears when in Webtools/Data maintenance you want to edit an entity: it's on Stamp fields. It's not reproducible in trunk, because there the renderDateTimeField macro is not used
